title: PoSynDA: Multi-Hypothesis Pose Synthesis Domain Adaptation for Robust 3D Human Pose Estimation. (arXiv:2308.09678v2 [cs.CV] UPDATED)
abstract: Existing 3D human pose estimators face challenges in adapting to new datasets due to the lack of 2D-3D pose pairs in training sets. To overcome this issue, we propose \textit{Multi-Hypothesis \textbf{P}ose \textbf{Syn}thesis \textbf{D}omain \textbf{A}daptation} (\textbf{PoSynDA}) framework to bridge this data disparity gap in target domain. Typically, PoSynDA uses a diffusion-inspired structure to simulate 3D pose distribution in the target domain. By incorporating a multi-hypothesis network, PoSynDA generates diverse pose hypotheses and aligns them with the target domain. To do this, it first utilizes target-specific source augmentation to obtain the target domain distribution data from the source domain by decoupling the scale and position parameters. The process is then further refined through the teacher-student paradigm and low-rank adaptation. With extensive comparison of benchmarks such as Human3.6M and MPI-INF-3DHP, PoSynDA demonstrates competitive performance, even comparable

translated_title: PoSynDA: 多假设姿势合成域自适应用于鲁棒的3D人体姿势估计
translated_abstract: 现有的3D人体姿势估计器面临着适应新数据集的挑战，因为训练集中缺乏2D-3D姿势对。为了解决这个问题，我们提出了PoSynDA框架，通过模拟目标域中的3D姿势分布来弥合数据差距。通常情况下，PoSynDA使用一个受扩散启发的结构来模拟目标域中的3D姿势分布。通过加入多假设网络，PoSynDA生成多样化的姿势假设，并将其与目标域对齐。为此，它首先利用目标特定的源增强方法，通过解耦缩放和位置参数，从源域中获取目标域分布数据。然后通过教师-学生范式和低秩自适应进一步优化该过程。通过对Human3.6M和MPI-INF-3DHP等基准的广泛比较，PoSynDA展现出了竞争性能，甚至可以与最先进的方法相媲美。
tldr: PoSynDA框架通过模拟目标域中的3D姿势分布和使用多假设网络来实现鲁棒的3D人体姿势估计。通过教师-学生范式和低秩自适应进一步优化该过程。在多个基准测试中展示了竞争性能。
